name: Seconds (Re-X)
description:
Dev Atlas Jam entry.

Mechanics:

Move with wasd or arrow keys.

You can shoot and kill the enemies but beware they'll shoot back if the see you!

You can check the time by pressing Ctrl button. As you are stuck in 10 seconds enemies will re-spawn after timer set back again so you must get into safe place where they won't be able to see you.

Use left click to shoot.

You have to reach to the blue bar to proceed to the next level.
